name: Elephant House Tonic
description: Elephant House Tonic adds just the right note to your favourite alcoholic beverage, helping to enhance the original flavour of your drink at every sip. Whether served with its usual and traditional accompaniment, Gin, or an alternative like rum, port or vodka, Elephant House Tonic is invaluable as a chaser and a must-have for any social gathering. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
